overview: In "Frankenpooh", it's a dark night in the Hundred Acre Wood, and Piglet wants to tell a nice, not-so-scary story, but Tigger tells a very scary story about Dr. Von Piglet creating The Monster Frankenpooh. Next, in "Things that go Piglet in the Night", Pooh and the gang believe there is a ghost in the Hundred Acre Wood. Finally, in "Pooh Moon",  Pooh and Piglet find theyâ€™ve landed on the Honey Moon, while the others think the Grab-Me Gotcha has got them!
title: Winnie the Pooh: Frankenpooh
